column1: #Text=Aang says : " By the way , we kind of borrowed your book . "
#Text=Wu says : " So you messed with the clouds , did you ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " No offense , but I hope this taught everyone a lesson about not relying too much on fortune telling . "
#Text=Calm man says : " But Aunt Wu predicted the village would n't be destroyed and it was n't .
